holidays.title: Fish Tank Floorshow Night
holidays.description: Get ready to be entertained by the fish in the spotlight tonight.

holidays.title: International Day for Universal Access to Information
holidays.description: Be ready to celebrate this day by accessing as much information as possible!

holidays.title: International Poke Day
holidays.description: Dig into a bowl of poke and learn how you can make this day fun.

holidays.title: International Right To Know Day
holidays.description: It's important to know because knowledge is power. Today, we celebrate our right to that power.

holidays.title: National Chris Day
holidays.description: Chris is a name that’s strong and filled with meaning for followers of the Christian faith.

holidays.title: National Good Neighbor Day
holidays.description: Are you a good neighbor? How do you show it?

holidays.title: National Neighbor Day
holidays.description: As Mister Rogers would say, "Please won't you be...my neighbor?"

holidays.title: National North Carolina Day
holidays.description: Visit natural reserves like the Blue Ridge Mountains and cultural hotspots today.

holidays.title: National Self Awareness Day
holidays.description: National Self-Awareness Day is a holiday that teaches people in the U.S. about self-awareness.

holidays.title: NATIONAL STRAWBERRY CREAM PIE DAY
holidays.description: Today's just the perfect day to indulge your sweet tooth with your favorite cream pie recipe!

holidays.title: Remember Me Thursday
holidays.description: Honor our stray, abandoned, and orphaned pets today, because their lives matter too.

holidays.title: St. Wenceslas Day — Statehood Day
holidays.description: Celebrated for the last two decades, this day honors the patron saint of the Czech Republic.

holidays.title: World Maritime Day
holidays.description: Toss your hats in honor of the seafarers on World Maritime Day.

holidays.title: World Rabies Day
holidays.description: More than 99 percent of human cases coming from dog bites.

holidays.title: Brigitte Bardot’s Birthday
holidays.description: This iconic actress and model is a staple of the 20th-century movie industry.

holidays.title: Hilary Duff’s Birthday
holidays.description: Multifaceted, extremely talented, and a genuinely lovely person — we all love Hilary Duff!

holidays.title: Jasper Dolphin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jasper Dolphin is a talented and well-loved American actor and rapper. Today, we celebrate him.

holidays.title: Jeezy’s Birthday
holidays.description: As a rap legend, Jeezy has worked hard to make his way to the top!

holidays.title: Momona Tamada’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young actress has the potential to make it big in Hollywood.

holidays.title: Naomi Watts’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress is ever ready to take her fans to another realm of entertainment.

holidays.title: Nick Viall’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ruggedly handsome with a heart of gold, what’s not to love about Nick Viall?

holidays.title: Spencer Rattler’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this athlete, irrevocable fame and success are a few games away!

holidays.title: St. Vincent’s Birthday
holidays.description: Take the chance to know more about the unique and extraordinary singer St. Vincent.

holidays.title: The Anime Man’s Birthday
holidays.description: Anime, YouTube, acting, and more — The Anime Man continues to excel in them all.

holidays.title: Tokyoxvanity’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media and reality star knows the meaning of never giving up!
